title: Introducing: H A R T E B E E S T
body:
Who said upper case letters and spaces between each of them was no longer cool?

Cue H A R T E B E E S T, another set of emerging producers/vocalists that joins a stellar cast including the likes of Oceaán, Cosmo Sheldrake, Jungle, and Dornik.

Increasingly infectious after each listen, H A R T E B E E S T’s debut effort ‘death.’ is beautifully simple affair, marrying a strong beat to a vocal melody that is reminiscent of a certain Jonathan Higgs, however far less falsetto and perhaps at half the speed.

Melodramatic yet undeniably catchy, ‘death.’ is certainly reason enough to keep an eye on the development of H A R T E B E E S T.
